summary: This code is using the emacsclient to execute Emacs Lisp commands, retrieving current buffer contents, and opening/printing "autopush.sh" file.

details.comment: This code is using the emacsclient to execute Emacs Lisp commands, retrieving current buffer contents, and opening/printing "autopush.sh" file.
details.content:
emacsclient -s foo -e "\`(,(print (current-buffer)) ,(find-file \"autopush.sh\") ,(print (current-buffer)))"
# not the same in fish. backtick no need to escape.
